title: Bagels and Beans - Plaats
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain of lunchrooms, this one is in the city center in a Jugendstil building close to the Binnenhof/Parliament. Offers some vegetarian and vegan bagels plus sweets, coffee with soymilk option, fresh juices. Uses some fair-trade and organic ingredients. Free Wi-Fi.
